item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi ,How are you buddy ?

I am still working on this site so , please just hang on if you wanna see stuff about me here.

Until then , try out the links to your left to get in touch with me.

item.title: Credits
item.description:
This site was built upon the Geo theme by Alex Urquhart

I’ve made this a bit more secure and faster as compared to Alex’s version and plan to add more features in the future.

item.title: My First post
item.description: Hello Blogging World , This is my first blog and I am currently working on my future blogs so stay tuned for more .
